content:
Audio highlights from the March 16th 2019 edition

AFTER THERESA MAY’S withdrawal deal was decisively rejected for a second time last week, Brexit will almost certainly be delayed. It is time for Parliament to seize the initiative to lift the country out of chaos. Plus, how sharing a plate of food could help international diplomacy. And the world wide web has turned 30—what does its future hold? Lane Greene hosts.

ex: 网络 音频；声卡；音效
eg2: audio and video cassettes
盒式录音带和录像带

wp.Brian Greene: 布赖恩·格林;格林恩;布莱恩·格林;布莱恩·格林恩
wp.Brendan Greene: 格瑞尼;格里尼;布兰登·格林
wp.Peter Greene: 彼得·格林纳;格林纳;彼德·格雷尼;格林恩
wp.Milton Greene: 米尔顿·格林;格瑞尼;饰演

ex: n. 车道；小巷；泳道；胡同
网络 小路；通道；跑道
eg2: winding country lanes
蜿蜒的乡间小路
We drove along a muddy lane to reach the farmhouse.
我们驾车沿泥泞的小路到达农舍。
The quickest way is through the back lanes behind the bus station.
最近的路是穿过公共汽车站后面的小巷。
Park Lane
帕克里
the inside/middle lane
内车道；中车道
the northbound/southbound lane
北行╱南行车道
to change lanes
变换车道
She signalled and pulled over into the slow lane.
她给信号后把车开进了慢车道。
a four-lane highway
四车道公路
The Australian in lane four is coming up fast from behind.
第四道的澳大利亚选手正从后面快速追赶上来。
one of the world's busiest shipping/sea lanes
世界上最繁忙的海运航线之一

ex: n. 议会；国会；英国议会（包括下议院和上议院）；一届议会的会期
网络 百乐门；国会大厦；议会大厦
eg2: The German parliament is called the ‘Bundestag’.
德国的议会称为 Bundestag。
a Member of Parliament
议会议员
The issue was debated in Parliament .
议会就这个问题进行了辩论。
an Act of Parliament
议会法案
to win a seat in Parliament
赢得议会中的一个席位
to be elected to Parliament
当选为议会议员
We are now into the second half of the parliament.
我们现已进入了本届议会的后半任期。
to dissolve Parliament(= formally end its activities) and call an election
解散议会并举行大选

ex: n. 特丽萨；【女名】女子名
网络 泰丽莎；傅颖；特里萨
网络 混沌；浑沌；乱战
eg2: economic/political/domestic chaos
经济╱政治╱国内的混乱
Heavy snow has caused total chaos on the roads.
大雪导致道路上交通一片混乱。
The house was in chaos after the party.
聚会后，房子里一片狼藉。
I believe we can act boldly, and , in the face of a common threat.
我相信面对这一共同威胁，我们能够采取勇敢、果断的行动。
We will address them firmly and decisively as we pursue the urgent work we have to do together.
在我们从事我们必须为之共同努力的紧迫工作时，我们将坚定并果断地解决这些问题。
Exactly 100 years ago, a home secretary was under pressure from the media and fellow politicians to act decisively against outrage on the streets of London.
整整100年以前，一位内政大臣承受着媒体和身边政治家们的压力，需要果断地采取行动应对伦敦街头的暴乱。

wp.dollar diplomacy: 银弹外交;金元外交;财力外交;美元外交
wp.media diplomacy: 媒体外交;媒介外交;传媒外交
wp.Quiet Diplomacy: 静默外交;宁静外交;温和外交;无声外交

ex: n. 外交；外交手腕；交际手段
eg2: His profession is .
他是职业外交人员。
If through strong diplomacy with Russia and our other partners we can reduce or eliminate that threat, it obviously shapes the way at which we look at missile defense.
如果我们能通过与俄罗斯及其他合作伙伴展开的强有力外交减低或消除这种威胁，那么这将显然会影响我们对导弹防御的看法。

wp.Improved Initiative: 精通先攻;优先改善;强化先攻;改善优先权
wp.Energy Initiative: 能源倡议;能源计划;能源研究计划;研究小组
wp.Sunshot Initiative: 太阳计划;新能源计划;升夏倡议;射日计划
wp.Take initiative: 积极主动;主动性;工作主动

ex: n. 主动权；首创精神；新方案；倡议
adj. 主动的；自发的；起始的
eg2: I put it all down to his hard work and .
我把这一切归因于他工作既勤奋又主动。
He showed little , handling all matters strictly by the book.
他缺乏首创精神，墨守成规地办一切事情。
These are the resources that we need to seize the , while building the Afghan capacity that can allow for a responsible transition of our forces out of Afghanistan.
这是我们为了掌握主动权所必需的资源，同时阿富汗的能力将得到加强，使我们的部队能够以负责任的方式离开阿富汗。

ex: vt. 抓住；夺取；理解；逮捕
vi. 抓住；利用；（机器）卡住

wp.seize opportunities: 抓住机遇;捉住机遇;把握时机;捉住机会
wp.seize children: 抓住儿童;占领孩子;抓住孩子

eg2: The opportunity is there. Why not seize it?
机会正在那儿呢，为什么不抓住它？
If you fail to oil the engine regularly, it would  up  without warning.
如果你不定期给发动机注油，它不定那天就会突然卡住。
“I think that there is no reason why we should not seize this opportunity and this moment,” the president said.
奥巴马总统说："我认为，没有任何理由让我们不去抓住这个机会和这个时刻。"

wp.withdrawal sleeve: 退卸套;退卸衬套;分离套筒
wp.strategic withdrawal: 战略撤退;战略转移;计谋撤退

ex: n. 撤退，收回；提款；取消；退股
eg2: Atomicity requires that both  and deposit should happen in one go, or neither must occur.
原子性要求提款和存款必须同时发生，或者二者都不发生。
While China does not welcome the U.S. presence near its border, it wants stability on its western flank and believes an abrupt withdrawal of Washington's support for Pakistan could imperil that.
尽管中国不欢迎美国势力出现在其边境附近，但中国希望有个稳定的西部，并认为华府突然收回对巴基斯坦的支持可能危及其边境稳定。
Dreams about smoking were the result of tobacco , as 97% of subjects did not have them while smoking, and their occurrence was significantly related to the duration of abstinence.
与吸烟有关的梦是香烟被收回引起的，约97%的病例在吸烟时不会做那样的梦，这些梦的出现与禁烟的持续有极大关系。

Title: A delay to Brexit, dinner diplomacy and the future of the world wide web

paperStatistics.title: A delay to Brexit, dinner diplomacy and the future of the world wide web
paperStatistics.desc: Audio highlights from the March 16th 2019 edition
